portfolio.title: Culture Living
portfolio.description: A full MERN stack based web application to support authentic family to run their homestay by provding accommodation to tourist and travellers. ReactJS used to create fully responsive, single page front-end. ExpressJS is used to create APIs and MongoDB is used for storing data.

portfolio.title: Hello World!
portfolio.description: A full MERN stack web app that emulates core functionality of social media platforms. I implemented features including user login-signup, post creation, like the posts and follow unfollow the other users. along with MERN Technology, I used Redux for state management, JWT Token for authentication.,

portfolio.title: Task Manager
portfolio.description: A MERN stack based Task Manager web application empowers users to efficiently manage tasks with ease. With comprehensive CRUD functionality, you can effortlessly create, view, update, and delete tasks, providing a seamless and organized task management experience.
